His Lordship Most Rev. Dr VINCENT JOSEPH MARIUS,​ PEIRIS – It is with deep regret that we announce the demise of His Lordship Most Rev. Dr Vincent Joseph Marius Peiris,​ Auxiliary Bishop Emeritus of Colombo on Monday the 13th May 2024. He was the beloved son of the late Mr Henry Vincent Peiris and the late Mrs L. Eslin Peiris. For public respect,​ his remains lie in state at the Sacred Heart Chapel,​ Archbishop’s House,​ Colombo on Thursday,​ 16th May,​ from 9.00 a.m. to Friday,​ 17th May till 11.00 a.m. and thereafter transferred to St. Mary’s Church,​ Katukurunda. Requiem Mass will be held on Saturday,​ 18th May at 3.00 p.m. followed by burial. Archbishop’s House,​ Borella.
